name: Health & Medical
description: We help children suffering from Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome, Spinal Bifida, and Muscular Dystrophy.

name: Vocational Training
description: We focus providing vocational training to the children with disabilities to develop life skills for self sustenance.

name: Theraupetic Support
description: We provide therapeutic support to the children with disabilities to improve their physical and mental health.

name: Home Visit & Counseling
description: Home visit and counseling for the children who are unable to attend the center.

name: Daily Living Support
description: We provide daily living support to the children with disabilities to improve their quality of life.

name: Community & Activites
description: We help the children to engage in community social activities to connect with the society.
